text: Tara pichata sihamte angikara bhanga karaara karane sihamtaka ami abhisampata karaicho arau sihamtara hrdayaka kathina karai dicho, sihamte sabdaboraka nija sthanara paraa bikrta karae arau sihamtaka yi upadesa diya haichila tara ekansa sihamte paharai gaiche. Tumi sadaya sihamtara kichusankhyakara bahirae adhikansake'i bisbasaghatakata karaomte dekhibalai paba, seye sihamtaka ksama karaa arau upeksa karaa. Niscaya allahe satkarmaparaayanakarai sakalaka bhala paya
